verses.roman:
ācārya kahe, ihāke kene dile daraśana
dui prakārete kare more viḍambana

synonyms: ācārya kahe—Śrī Advaita Ācārya said; ihāke—unto him; kene—why; dile—You gave; daraśana—audience; dui—two; prakārete—in ways; kare—does; more—unto Me; viḍambana—cheating.
translation: Advaita Ācārya then said to Caitanya Mahāprabhu, "Why have You called back this man and allowed him to see You? He has cheated Me in two ways."
